meaning_str.bing:
n. 呼吸
adj. 呼吸的；(画像等)栩栩如生的
v. “breathe”的现在分词
网络. 人工呼吸；排气；放气

呼吸的；(画像等)栩栩如生的

呼吸；呼吸声；（音乐或诗歌中的）呼吸标记
呼吸；呼出；吐出；吸；（breathe的现在分词）

1.en: He could hear Rudolph breathing steadily, asleep, as he closed the door quietly behind him.
1.cn: 他轻轻地随手把门带上，听得见鲁道夫均匀的呼吸声，睡得正香。

2.en: I could hear my own breathing as if I were suddenly wearing a space suit from 2001: A Space Odyssey.
2.cn: 我可以听到自己的呼吸声，就好像我忽然穿上了来自《2001太空漫游》的太空衣。

3.en: James's breathing was as if strangled; his eyes were closed.
3.cn: 詹姆士的呼吸就象有人扼着脖子似的，眼睛闭着。

0.en: And you did it so casually, no rapid breathing, no increase in perspiration.
0.cn: 而且你表现得如此从容，没有呼吸急促，也没有冒汗。

1.en: Now, I look back over my shoulder to see if I'm being followed. And I'm breathing.
1.cn: 然后从肩膀上往后看，有没有人跟踪，然后呼吸。

2.en: I couldn't stop breathing it in, filling my lungs with the sweetest smell I'd ever known.
2.cn: 我忍不住大口呼吸，让肺里溢满甜美醉人的气息。

3.en: Alrighty. We're gonna start with some basic third stage breathing exercises, so Mummies, why don't you get on your back?
3.cn: 首先是第三阶段基本呼吸练习，各位妈妈请躺下。

4.en: And soon where there used to be my granddaughter breathing and my son laughing, there will be nothing.
4.cn: 存在我的记忆中，孙女的呼吸和儿子的笑声，很快就将消失了。

5.en: Now, GHB gives the user a feeling of euphoria, but take it in combination with alcohol and you stop breathing.
5.cn: G水能够让服用者极度兴奋，但与酒精混合，会让人停止呼吸。

6.en: When my granddaughter falls asleep in my lap, I try to catch the feeling of her breathing against me.
6.cn: 当我孙女靠在我腿上熟睡时，我想努力抓住她的呼吸触碰在我身上的感觉。

7.en: I'm feeling better. Can I get up now? No, you must lie very still, but please keep breathing.
7.cn: 我已经感觉好多了，我可以起来了吗？不行，你现在一定要躺着，请保持呼吸知道吗？

8.en: Eh, I'm feeling better. Can I get up now? No, you must lie very still, but please keep breathing.
8.cn: 额，我感觉好点了。我现在可以起来了吗？不，你必须静静地躺着，但请保持呼吸。

9.en: I'm feeling better. Can I get up now? No, you must lie very still, but please keep breathing.
9.cn: 恩，我已经感觉好多了，我可以起来了吗。不行，你现在一定要躺着，请保持呼吸知道吗。

10.en: This thing's pretty cool. It interprets emotions using a wireless signal to analyze subtle changes in breathing and heart rate.
10.cn: 这东西真酷。利用无线信号分析呼吸和心率的细微变化来解读情绪。

11.en: This is our camp side. Breathe in the wonderful fresh air, children. Excellent breathing. Now let's put up our tents.
11.cn: 好啦！这就是我们的露营地啦。呼吸一下这无比清新的空气吧孩子们。做得很好孩子们！现在我们一起把帐篷搭起来吧。

12.en: I just watched her sleep for like hours, just breathing in and breathing out.
12.cn: 我看着她睡觉看了好久，就这样吸气，吐气。

13.en: I'm breathing oxygen that was made two and a half billion years ago.
13.cn: 我吸入的氧气产生于25亿年之前。

14.en: They're dead! No, they're breathing. They're asleep? No, their eyes are open.
14.cn: 他们死了，不 他们还有气儿 是睡着了? 不 他们眼睛还张着。

15.en: The Emperor is breathing his last and he has requested the presence of his imperial consort.
15.cn: 皇上只剩最后一口气了，他要求见他的皇后。

16.en: How? The Arkenstone lies half a world away, buried beneath the feet of a fire breathing dragon.
16.cn: 怎么找?宝石远在半个中土世界之外，在那只火龙的魔掌中。

17.en: Watch a posture and physicality, this include everything from stand and naturally, to breathing from your diaphragm.
17.cn: 注意自己的仪态，从头到脚每个细节都要滴水不漏。

18.en: In fact, if I catch you with cigarette, you're fired. So go on, get out of here. Go on, I don't want you breathing this stuff.
18.cn: 若被我查到你有吸烟，我一定炒你鱿鱼，走吧，离开这里，我不要你吸二手烟。

19.en: That creature, that rotting thing is a living, breathing coagulation of human evil. And if the only thing I ever do in this world is drive him out of it, then my life will not have been wasted.
19.cn: 那个家伙，那腐败的东西，是人类罪恶活生生的结晶。如果我在这世上唯一做的一件事就是把他驱逐出去，那我也不枉此生了。
